title: Riot, You're Matchmaking is Pure Garbage
body: My top laner didn't know how to follow TPs. My jungler ulted after we all died and didn't use it to peel. I am seriously starting to question this system.

replies.body: Since the creation of this game XD

Looks like reasonable matchmaking to me, you're on the low end of the spectrum near silver and low gold, so I'd expect dumb mistakes like that to happen, even though no matter how good you are you will always make mistakes.
I'm facking gold 2 why am I placed with silver shits.

Because the entire enemy team is lower than you, so your team was lowered to compensate.

That or your mmr is low enough to be matched with low gold silver while at gold 2, which means you need to really start playing better before you start losing more lp than you gain.


Based on games I looked at on op.gg, the system was most likely having a hard time finding equal level teams, so it just grabbed what it could.

The ranked system does this sometimes if the population is lower than normal or queues are just taking too long.



Also I'd be careful with the term "silver shits" most people, including me have been there at some point, I'm now diamond 3 on my mid account, working to see if I can get that high as adc too.
My mmr is fine. That's unfortunate if it does that lol. 1 person can't make much of a difference. I played support too because the q time was aids.
